'''Stax Stonecutter''' is a [[character]] from the novel ''[[Minecraft: The Voyage]]'', written by [[w:Jason_Fry|Jason Fry]]. Stax with his [[cat]]s were living peaceful life in a house by the sea on the [[Stonecutter peninsula]] until his home was destroyed and he was marooned by pirates in the [[Sea of Sorrows]].

== Appearance ==
Stax's appearance wasn't directly described in the novel,but in few pages there were some small details that can hint on how Stax looks.

Stax is described as a young man, in the book there were moments when it was mentioned that he has a beard, also at some point in the novel Stax needed to cut his hair, which may imply that he has short hair now.

== Personality ==
Stax Stonecutter is a brave man who was forced to adapt to his difficult situation after being marooned by pirates. Initially, Stax was typical loner who didn't really care about adventures or pretty much anything besides cats and flowers. But after everything that happened in the story he became much more brave and adventurous which lead to him deciding to leave Stonecutter peninsula and go on adventure around the overworld in the end.
